data.text: Psychologist Albert Ellis. Ellis said if you look at the things that anger you upset you or frustrate you

data.text: I mean if she has low self-esteem, or doesn't trust me for whatever reasons. She should feel exactly this way

data.text: Speeds up and gets ahead of me, and I got mad and then I started realizing hey, I'm musterbating in the car

data.text: That's just how it is and once I realized I was musturbating. I immediately felt better
